textBeforeTable: Unaccompanied Minors: Minimum unaccompanied minor age is 21 or older. Anyone under the age of 21 must be accompanied by a parent, guardian, or chaperone 25 years or older in the same cabin. Minors under age 18 traveling to certain foreign countries must be accompanied by both parents. Pregnancy Restrictions: Holland America will not accept passengers who will have entered their 24th week of pregnancy as of their embarkation date. Child Rates: Infant rates vary by sailing. Age Ranges: Infant age range is 6 to 23 months. Child age range is 2 to 18 years. Adult age range is 19 to 59 years. Senior age range is 60 plus years. Age and Pregnancy Restrictions Age and pregnancy restrictions Cruise Itinerary Reviews Deck Plans Entertainment Dining
textAfterTable: Highlights: An elegant ship with over $2 million worth of art including paintings, armor and Jacob's Staircase, a sculpture of Murano stained glass. Formal dining in the two-tier Rotterdam Dining room, or relaxed ambiance for all three meals can be found in the Lido Restaurant. The Wajang Theatre shows two movies daily and also hosts culinary demonstrations on specific sailings. Past guest of the Veendam rave about the attentive staff that go above and beyond the expected. Your Package Includes: Your package includes shipboard accommodations, ocean transportation, fabulous entertainment and daily activities, on-board meals and some beverages. It does not include shore excursions, personal expenses, gratuities, or alcoholic beverages. Government fees and taxes are not included. View more
